Players take the role of Mina, a young adventurer from the Dawnside, who must traverse a perilous and shattered world called the Duskside, to find her long-lost brother who was kidnapped by the forces of a great demon named Termina.

- It’s All in the Arts -


Mina’s gifted with the ability to use fire-elemental magic called Arts! Arts allow her to navigate harsh conditions while battling any foes that stand in her way! Mina can also supercharge Arts to trade blows with stronger enemies in tougher encounters!

- Features -


  • Use Arts to traverse a challenging world and defeat enemies and solve puzzles!
  • A hybrid retro-modern-styled adventure will bring you back to the past, but with a modern twist!
  • Take on optional side quests in future updates!
  • Includes an optional CRT filter for nostalgic flair!

- Dynamic Updates -


Besides run-of-the-mill bugfixes, tweaks, and quality-of-life improvements, Dawn of Dusk will be regularly updated to keep things fresh with additional content, areas, sidequests, and more.   

Completely free of charge. Simply update and have fun!* 

*(Please note: some content will require you to complete Dawn of Dusk in order to be unlocked.)

item.title: Die Erdnussbutter
item.description:
About This Game

Shoot, dash, and power your way through enemy lines in the arcade-style 2D side scroller, Die Erdnussbutter! Use the power of peanut butter to destroy enemy rations, battle bosses, and spread the smooth (or crunchy) flavor of freedom throughout the battlefield. Peanut butter not included.

Key Features:
  • 4 weapons, each with their own special and ultimate abilities
  • 3 stages
  • 3 bosses
  • 14 unique upgrades to power up with
  • Randomly generated levels for non-stop replayability

item.title: Arsenal Online
item.description:
About This Game

Arsenal Online is a high-octane 2D shooter. Jump into some quick and explosive shoot-em-up action!

SOLO AND CO-OP PLAY

Play one of many fun game modes either solo or with a friend online! Each game mode has a different objective, such as Sniper where accuracy is rewarded, or Time Attack where maximum kills is the goal.

HUNDREDS OF WEAPONS AND ATTACHMENTS

Unlock hundreds of weapons and attachments, ranging from pistols, SMGs, assault rifles, LMGs, sniper rifles, and more!

FIRING RANGE

Just want to equip a weapon and shoot targets? Enter the firing range where all weapons and attachments are immediately accessible.

KEY FEATURES

  • Hundreds of weapons and attachments to unlock
  • Multiple game modes
  • Customizable loadouts and classes
  • Rank progression system
  • Online multiplayer or local play
  • Worldwide leaderboards
  • Achievements

item.title: The Hopebringer
item.description:
About This Game

The Hopebringer is a top down RPG, featuring procedurally generated scenarios in a fantasy setting. Partake in single player, or online co-op adventures. Unlock new scenarios, which you can then repeat at any time in multiplayer.

Key Features

  • Top down combat in a fantasy survival RPG setting.
  • Procedurally generated scenarios which are repeatable.
  • Unlock new scenarios as you progress.
  • Single player or co-op multiplayer.
  • Three unique skill lines for each class.
  • Customize your skills by improving them with up to 25 ranks per skill.
  • Battle vs. powerful bosses.
  • Adventure alongside NPC companions and pets.
  • Upgrade your equipment using a socket system.
  • Transmute items to create more powerful variations.
  • Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

item.title: TYRONE SOULZ
item.description:
About This Game

It was supposed to be an uneventful arrest, but after the suspect made a blood pact with Yakub, this rookie cop is in for much more than he bargained for. Can he defeat Tyrone and return home to his family?

The TL;DR

  • The world's first and only Yakubian inspired souls-like (extremely good gameplay)
  • Epic boss battle against Tyrone (a black man)
  • Full voice acting
  • Drink white energy drinks to recover HP
  • It's only $1.95 just buy it
  • The trailer is better than the game
  • Canon to the lore of the CUCKOLD SIMULATOR universe
  • Extremely difficult (I can barely beat it)

item.title: Something
item.description:
About This Game

The easiest game you're ever going to play. Or is it?

Keep doing Something as the timer goes up. If you do Nothing, you lose.

If you don't like doing Something, go play Nothing instead.

item.title: Sleeping With Sakuya Izayoi
item.description:
About This Game

Story

In this small visual novel, your partner Sakuya Izayoi is tired after a long day of working at the Scarlet Devil Mansion, she invites you to relax with her in her private quarters! Talk to her, kiss her or just simply enjoy each other's presence.

Features

  • Chose up to 3 locations, the mansion quarters, the forest of magic or even an apartment room!
  • Ambient music
  • Gorgeous artwork with various expressions!
  • Kiss Sakuya!
  • Talk to Sakuya!
  • Relax with Sakuya!
  • Sakuya!

item.title: JustScroll
item.description:
About This Software

Change the volume of your system in an intuitive way by scrolling with your mouse. You could be watching a video, playing a fullscreen game or talking with friends, you no longer have to minimize anything or lose focus by going through convoluted menus every time you want to adjust your volume. All you have to do is either hold the Windows key and scroll, or simply bring your cursor to the taskbar and scroll.

Allow JustScroll to make your Windows experience easy and intuitive. Tried and tested for more than half-a-decade to ensure optimal feel and ease of use, it works by seamlessly integrating with your machine. Just install and enjoy.

Features:
- Windows Key + Scroll. Control your volume no matter what you are doing. This will NOT minimize your game / application.
- Volume Adjust: hold the Windows key and scroll to adjust your volume.
- Mute: hold the Windows key and middle-click with your mouse to mute.
- Taskbar Scroll. Control your volume with just one hand in an intuitive and easy way.
- Volume Adjust: position your cursor on the taskbar and scroll.
- Mute: position your cursor on the taskbar and middle-click with your mouse.

Advanced Features:
- Emergency Mute. Has your friend ever sent you an annoyingly loud video that you wanted to mute instantly? Well now you can, as JustScroll has an "emergency mute" that will mute your volume instantly as soon as you scroll your volume down fast in a panic.
- Precision Scroll. For the many that have an obsession with volume numbers, hold the left mouse button for a more precise adjustment of the volume. Is your volume stuck between 8 or 12? Bring it to 10. Or the other way around, whatever you prefer!

Because of how intuitive changing your volume with JustScroll is, it will feel like second nature in no time. It also launches with Windows, which you can always change by right-clicking on the tray icon and unticking "Run on Startup".

JustScroll offers a modern look and feel that fits right with the contemporary Windows environment, as it supports both dark and light Windows themes in regards to its tray icon looks.

Download and start scrolling now!

item.title: Nyran Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an epic journey with Nyran Survivors, an action-packed roguelite where you'll confront endless hordes of foes and take on formidable bosses. Unleash powerful skills, evolve your character and master ancient spells. Earn spoils from each battle to unlock new classes, upgrade your abilities, and forge a path to become the ultimate Mediator.

Classes


Choose your path from an array of distinct classes, each offering unparalleled abilities. Play up to 10 classes with more on the horizon.

Items


Over 80 items for you to equip with more along the way.

Skills


Nyran Survivors has over 100 unique spells and abilities for you to collect and master with more to come!

Boss Fights


6 unique bosses per map for you to defeat for a total of 30 bosses.

Upgrade


Upgrade your class through 40 levels.

Passives


Select from a variety of 12 distinct passives to enhance your abilities throughout the battle, with the option to have 3 active simultaneously.

Leaderboards

Can you secure the top spot and become a true legend? Let your name shine on the global stage of Nyran Survivors! The game lists the top 100 players' rating per map.

* uses a logged in Discord account

item.title: ARRIVAL: ZERO EARTH
item.description:
About This Game



Aliens have invaded the earth and you have to assemble an army of local townspeople to fight them!

Fight giant alien machinery, navigate through different biomes and alternate history timelines to discover and obliterate the true prime evil.

  • Set in Finland during the Winter in the '90s
  • Roguelike semi-autobattler gameplay
  • Control one large army through different procedurally generated levels
  • Collect items to gain new abilities
  • Different Unit types to build your army from
  • Units choose who they attack automatically, but you control where they move

In the game you unlock new units and items between runs, but there are no permanent stat upgrades between runs.

The game has:

  • 7 Unique Biomes
  • 18 Different Unit Types
  • 27 Different Item Types
  • 5 Enemy Types
  • 1 Boss Fight

item.title: F*CK STALIN
item.description:
About This Game

ABOUT

In F*CK STALIN your task is to torture Joseph Stalin and get as many points as possible using a wide variety of blocks and weapons.

GAMEPLAY

In the game you can build your own torture constructions, create an infinite number of Stalins and inflict suffering on him with firearms and white weapons, for which you receive points.

LEADERBOARD

All the points earned in the game are added up and then recorded in the global leaderboard. Perhaps it is YOU who will find yourself at the top of it!

PHOTO MODE

You can stop the game at any time using the advanced photo mode to take the perfect shot and share it with the community.

STEAM WORKSHOP

The game has support for Steam Workshop. Download maps created by the community or add your own creations.

item.title: Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

You’re enjoying your Christmas when the White Rabbit from Wonderland comes to you for help! The Christmas spirit is vanishing all over the world, but why? Come along for a fun adventure and return joy to the world by restoring harmony to the characters of Wonderland! Meet familiar characters in new places in this enchanting hidden-object puzzle adventure game!
  • Explore another classic Christmas tale in the bonus game!
  • Replay HOPs and mini-games!
  • Complete your achievements and collectibles!
  • Enjoy exclusive art, music, and other unique content!
  • Never get lost with the strategy guide!

item.title: Rutabaga Desert Storm
item.description:
About This Game

Lead the Invasion of the Middle Yeast as Rutabaga III and His Trusted Ally, Habanero Jr.

After Rutabaga III's publication of his Cruciferous Manifesto, he has put his fellow vegetable freedom fighters on the front lines. All part of his genius plan, pushing the human forces forward, and allowing for him and Habanero Jr. to sneak into the Middle Yeast and finally destroy the Flying Oppression Cube... once and for all.

Features:

  • Classic side-scrolling action
  • Parallax backgrounds and multiple areas
  • Singleplayer and Local Co-op (Multi-player requires multiple devices)
  • Highscore system to compete with friends
  • Tight flight controls and mashable fire button
  • Power-ups

  • 4 different enemies, with rayshield variants

  • Boss enemy, the Flying Oppression Cube

item.title: Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions
item.description:
About This Game

Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions

Embark on an immersive medieval fantasy survival odyssey where every decision shapes your destiny. Reclaim the stolen Crown and face the malevolent Shadowbringers.

Crafting Mastery:
Forge your legacy with an intricate crafting system. Create powerful weapons, enchanted armor, and essential tools. Customize your gear to suit your playstyle and enhance your chances of survival.

Skills and Abilities:
Hone your skills as you progress. Choose from diverse skills, specializing in combat, magic, summoning dragons and more or crafting. Evolve your character, adapting to new challenges and unlocking unique abilities and weapons to become the ultimate champion of Atham.



Mystical Magic:
Unleash the arcane with a rich magic system. Learn spells, harness elemental powers, and master the art of enchanting weapons. Magic is your key to overcoming adversaries and unveiling the secrets hidden within Atham.

Treacherous Dungeons:
Challenge your mettle in intricately designed dungeons. Face formidable guardians, and collect various items along your journey. Each dungeon is a unique trial that will test your wits, combat skills, and courage.



Diverse Lands:
Explore the diverse landscapes of Atham, from the desolate ruins of Minorith to the enchanting Al'Math Forest. Each land presents its own challenges, creatures, and secrets. Traverse the Plains of Bastonia, The deserted Lake Town, Ir'aloks Mountains, and beyond, each with its own unique charm and danger.

Epic Quests:
Embark on epic quests guided by the wise Great Elder Osimodius. Uncover the lore of Atham, make moral decisions, and shape the kingdom's fate. The narrative unfolds as you progress, with twists and turns that keep you engaged in the rich tapestry of this fantasy realm.



Building Strongholds:
Survival demands strategic thinking. Build and fortify strongholds to withstand the encroaching darkness. Customize your stronghold, manage resources, and create a home base where you can prepare for your next great adventure.

Become the True Champion:
Only the bravest will prevail in the Kingdom of Atham. Will you rise as the true champion, vanquish the Shadowbringers, and restore light to this mystical realm? Your journey awaits, adventurer. The fate of Atham rests in your hands.

item.title: Minigame Game
item.description:
About This Game

Minigame Game is a first-person focused minigame collection that supports anywhere from 2-16 players. Grab your weapons and enter the "Minigame Game" arcade!

Test your skills!

Shoot, bunnyhop, swing, and dance your way to victory in a variety of minigames designed to put your classic FPS skills to the test. Featuring 35+ minigames that will pit you with and against your friends.

Get the high score!

Whoever has the most points at the end of each minigame playlist is crowned the winner of the arcade. Your score and achievements are tracked to unlock cosmetics that you can show off!

Level up!

As you level up you’ll be able to choose from an ever-increasing selection of minigames. From fist fights and rocket jumping to shooting glass floors and swinging through space, there’s a minigame for everyone!

Host your own arcade lobby!

Compete in a random collection of minigames of your choosing with friends and other players online. Add modifiers such as increasing the number of rounds, enabling team selection, or even playing with bots! (Bots are not available in all minigames but more are being added as we continue to update the game!)

item.title: Minigame Game
item.description:
About This Game

Minigame Game is a first-person focused minigame collection that supports anywhere from 2-16 players. Grab your weapons and enter the "Minigame Game" arcade!

Test your skills!

Shoot, bunnyhop, swing, and dance your way to victory in a variety of minigames designed to put your classic FPS skills to the test. Featuring 35+ minigames that will pit you with and against your friends.

Get the high score!

Whoever has the most points at the end of each minigame playlist is crowned the winner of the arcade. Your score and achievements are tracked to unlock cosmetics that you can show off!

Level up!

As you level up you’ll be able to choose from an ever-increasing selection of minigames. From fist fights and rocket jumping to shooting glass floors and swinging through space, there’s a minigame for everyone!

Host your own arcade lobby!

Compete in a random collection of minigames of your choosing with friends and other players online. Add modifiers such as increasing the number of rounds, enabling team selection, or even playing with bots! (Bots are not available in all minigames but more are being added as we continue to update the game!)

item.title: Legendary Hoplite: Arachne’s Trial
item.description:
About This Game

Try out the free prologue to get a taste of the exciting gameplay and easily transfer your progress to the full game.

Transfer your progress to the main game

The main game offers three acts, 38 areas, mini-games, and a lot of gear options for your hero. Progress seamlessly transfers from the prologue to the main game.

Face 10 Levels and 2 Boss Battles

Face the challenge of 10 distinct levels, each filled with hordes of mythic monsters. Try 6 different armies and test your skills against Arachne at the end of the prologue.

Customize Your Build and Power Up Your Army

Customize your build by trying out various gear combinations you come across. Find the perfect match for your playstyle as you explore. Strengthen your army by upgrading them and merging with the Hero to amplify your power, ready to face and conquer the enemy.

War technique

Elevate your armies with War Technique—a fresh way to upgrade. Experiment with various combos and effortlessly switch up your enhancements for effective improvements.

item.title: Seasons of Rocco
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the enchanting world of 'Seasons Of Rocco,' where nature reclaims its space, and a lovable raccoon named Rocco looks to you for guidance. In this cozy simulation, your goal is to assist Rocco in surviving the challenges of each winter. Explore Rocco’s world in 2 playable seasons; Autumn and Spring.

Rocco's world is a tranquil haven, offering a peaceful escape for those who cherish relaxation over challenges. Immerse yourself in the soothing ambiance of nature's beauty, where seasons unfolds with its unique charm.



Help Rocco gather fruit to prepare for the winter ahead. Discover the treasures scattered in the warm hues of autumn, and experience the joy of gathering nature's bounty. Explore through rustling leaves, gather fruit for Rocco and sort them at his Tree House! 🍂❄️



As spring arrives, plant the seeds collected during winter, and experience the joy of new life budding. Explore the blooming landscapes as nature awakens, bringing forth vibrant colors. Witness the beauty of renewal and growth in every corner of Rocco's world. 🌱☀️


'Seasons Of Rocco' is more than a game; it's an invitation to unwind, explore, and create a harmonious world filled with heartwarming moments. Join Rocco and embark on a journey where the seasons become chapters of joy.


About Vivid Visions Studios:

Vivid Visions Studio was founded back in October of 2023, as part of our Bachelor program at the Rotterdam of Applied Sciences in The Netherlands. We're a team of 17 students, starting our very first game development project. For our debut in the gaming world, we aimed to bring more positivity into the industry. With "Seasons of Rocco," we're taking our first steps toward creating a wholesome gaming experience. We're excited to see what the future will bring!

item.title: Computer Repair Shop
item.description:
About This Game


Identify and fix problems with computers arriving for repair. Replace quality parts with crappy parts if you wish.
Fix broken parts and assemble them in a computer. Then put it up for sale and negotiate with customers. Fool them if you can.


Develop viruses and infect computers with the money you earn. Join the robot wars and develop your own robot.

Hack customers computers and find out their bank details. Steal the money and leave no trace behind.

Research mysterious websites and explore extremely dangerous areas.

item.title: Gun vs. Zombies
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Gun vs. Zombies, the ultimate showdown between firepower and the undead! Brace yourself for an intense, physics-driven experience where your trusty gun becomes more than just a tool—it's your lifeline against waves of hungry zombies.

In Gun vs. Zombies, you're in control of a unique weapon that's not just about aiming and firing. This isn't your typical shooter; the gun's physics play a crucial role in your strategy. Every shot you take applies forces to the gun, causing it to move dynamically. Your skill in managing this movement while taking down hordes of zombies will determine your survival.

Your mission is clear: defend the precious brain located on the stage. Waves of relentless zombies are relentlessly advancing, driven by an insatiable hunger. It's up to your sharpshooting skills and mastery of the gun's physics to keep them at bay and prevent them from reaching their ultimate goal.

Compete against other players and showcase your skills on the global leaderboard! In Gun vs. Zombies, it's not just about surviving the zombie onslaught—it's about proving your mastery. Climb the ranks by showcasing your prowess in eliminating the undead.

Are you ready to experience the adrenaline rush of controlling a weapon that challenges traditional shooting mechanics? Get ready to immerse yourself in Gun vs. Zombies, where precision, strategy, and the laws of physics collide in a battle for survival!

item.title: Mystical Map
item.description:
About This Game

Mystical Map is a rogue-lite that allows players to draw out their own path in each playthrough. Maps are randomly generated, but YOU have the ability to choose your path and use any items found to enhance it. Chart your course and take on various action platforming challenges!

Rogue-"lite" with a personal twist




Each adventure is not the same. This is due not only to a randomized map with randomized rewards, but one where you choose which rooms to challenge... and which to ignore. Are you a speed runner looking to optimize efficiency? Or a completionist seeking out new challenges? Maybe you even found a rare item to enhance your current route!

Room types include:

  • Elite enemies
  • Platforming challenges
  • Mimic Treasure Rooms
  • And more!

Game Features

  • Randomized maps that allow complete control over paths.
  • Action platforming gameplay with engaging mechanics to combine the best of both genres.
  • Items and enhancements to help you through your run.
  • Challenging enemies and bosses waiting for you if you choose to face them.
  • Permanent upgrades to reward you for each and every run.

item.title: 36 Nights
item.description:
About This Game



36 Nights is a tower defense game with roguelike and bullet heaven elements. Buy turrets and upgrade your survivor to defend against waves of zombies. You'll need careful strategy and a little luck if you want to survive 36 nights...



Bullet heaven meets tower defense! Control a character with an upgradeable gun, and place turrets in the map to defend yourself! Be strategic about how to spend money and what upgrades you choose for your character in order to survive the night.



- 5 unique areas
- 6 unlockable characters
- 40+ character upgrades
- 15+ turret upgrades

item.title: Wicked Times
item.description:
About This Game

Wicked Times is a straightforward role playing game which uses real photos to depict locations and enemies. It's a hero manager/autobattler type of game. As you face stronger and stronger enemies you are given a set of side activities to strengthen your character, which become essential as the game progresses. Heal yourself with potions. Upgrade your spell book to deal more damage and your armor to withstand the backlash of the monsters.
Awaiting are 60 enemies, 3 final bosses, 64 locations, 6 cities and 12 side activities to strengthen yourself before facing your enemies.
Buckle up for the journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions.
